articles.title: Trump says he will double tariffs on steel and aluminum imports to 50 per cent
articles.description: WASHINGTON — U.S. President Donald Trump said he will double the tariffs on steel and aluminum imports to 50 per cent next Wednesday. Trump initially announced the boosted duties on steel during a rally at U.S.
articles.content:
WASHINGTON — U.S. President Donald Trump said he will double the tariffs on steel and aluminum imports to 50 per cent next Wednesday.
Trump initially announced the boosted duties on steel during a rally at U.S. Steel’s Mon Valley Works–Irvin Plant ne... [4936 chars]

articles.title: '60 Minutes' Lesley Stahl Dreads Paramount Settlement Of Trump Lawsuit
articles.description: '60 Minutes' veteran Lesley Stahl dreads Paramount's expected settlement of Donald Trump's "frivolous" lawsuit to gain Skydance merger approval.
articles.content:
Long-tenured 60 Minutes correspondent Lesley Stahl is fully expecting a settlement of Donald Trump’s “frivolous” $20 billion lawsuit, but she dreads what will follow the resolution of the case.

articles.title: The fight within the Trump administration
articles.description: Immigration officials recounted a heated exchange between White House deputy chief of staff Stephen Miller and ICE leaders that resulted in a staff shake-up.
articles.content:
Top Trump administration officials are unhappy with arrest and deportation numbers and have lambasted the federal immigration officials responsible for the operation, the Washington Examiner learned.

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Noem's story about a threat to kill Trump begins to unravel
articles.description: A claim by Homeland Security Secretary Kristi Noem that an immigrant threatened the life of President Donald Trump has begun to unravel.
articles.content:
A claim by Homeland Security Secretary Kristi Noem that an immigrant threatened the life of President Donald Trump has begun to unravel.
